mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commission_tb ( user_id, commission_email, commission_phone, commission_title, commission_author, commission_size, purchasePrice, commission_collection, wishPrice, commission_etc, commission_date, commission_state ) VALUES ( "2", #{commission_email}, #{commission_phone}, #{commission_title}, #{commission_author}, #{commission_size}, #{purchasePrice}, #{commission_collection}, #{wishPrice}, #{commission_etc}, now(), "대기중" )
mapper.select: SELECT commission_title, commission_author, DATE_FORMAT(commission_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS commission_date, commission_state FROM commission_tb WHERE user_id = "2"
select uuid ,uploadPath ,fileName, image, commission_id from commission_attach where commission_id=#{commission_id}
